name: Wormhole (Windows)
description:
Wormhole is an interactive, first-person stealth and strategy game where you are on board an enemy space station. You have to collect intel whilst sabotaging their resources placed around the map. However, completing each task normally will make you a traitor of your own team. Will you get caught and what ending will you receive? Download now!

Development Team Credits

  • Jonathan Ogilvie
  • Jonathan Cohen
  • Richard Koys
  • Alejandro Baeza Alvarez
